articles.title: Stock Market Live Updates: Sensex jumps 700 points, Nifty around 15,100; metals, banks lead - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Stock Market Live Updates: Indian indices were trading higher on Tuesday, tracking gains in Asian peers and US Futures. Broad-based buying was seen across sectors with metals, banks and auto indices boosting the most. At 9:18 am, the Sensex was up 567 points …

articles.author: Raffaella Ciccarelli
articles.title: Serial killer Charles Sobhraj was 'charming' and 'emanated power' - 9News
articles.description: Two Australian journalists spent weeks interviewing Asia's most notorious killer; Charles Sobhraj after his arrest. One said it was impossible not to fall under his spell.
articles.content: "Charles was just so charming," she said."We knew what he'd done, but he hadn't been convicted, so we had a kind of an open mind, but I - I mean, I'm really embarrassed to say I really wanted him to … [+7 chars]

articles.title: Singapore Poly and NIE students, NSF among 11 new unlinked Covid-19 community cases - AsiaOne

articles.description: Total Lunar Eclipse 2021: A total Lunar Eclipse will occur on May 26th. People living in the western parts of the United States, New Zealand, Australia and East Asia will enjoy the best view. Here is all you need to know about the Blood Moon
